testcase.name: OpenCart Affiliate Scenario
testcase.system-out: Given user is present on Login Page.........................................passed When title of the page is Account Login.....................................passed Then user enters username and password......................................passed Then user click on login button.............................................passed Then user is on Account Page................................................passed Then user clicks on Affiliate account link..................................passed Then user fills out affilate details........................................passed Then agreement option is clicked and continue is clicked....................passed Then success message should be displayed....................................passed And close the browser.......................................................passed
